languages.text: "Никак не пойму, почему Лорд-капитан не назначил{mf||а} булыжника маршалом? Он самый упертый и непробиваемый законник в секторе — какие еще качества нужны-то?"
languages.translation_comment: The RT ordered the Arbites to find a new Marshal, but did not choose Solomorne.

traits.locale_text: "Никак не пойму, почему Лорд-капитан тебя не назначил маршалом? Ты самый упертый и непробиваемый законник в секторе — какие еще качества нужны-то?"

languages.text: "I just don't get it: why didn't the Lord Captain make Master Killjoy the new Marshal? He's the most hard-headed, immovable boulder of a lawman in the sector — what other qualities are there to look for?"
languages.translation_comment: The RT ordered the Arbites to find a new Marshal, but did not choose Solomorne.
languages.original_text: "Никак не пойму, почему Лорд-капитан не назначил{mf||а} булыжника маршалом? Он самый упертый и непробиваемый законник в секторе — какие еще качества нужны-то?"

"I just don't get it: why didn't the Lord Captain make Master Killjoy the new Marshal? He's the most hard-headed, immovable boulder of a lawman in the sector — what other qualities are there to look for?"

languages.text: 「なんか納得いかないわ。なぜロード・キャプテンは堅物マスターを新しい将帥に任命しなかったの？彼ほど頭が固くて揺るがない、まさに岩のような法執行官なんて、この星域には他にいないのに。他に一体どんな資質が必要だっていうの？」
languages.original_text: "I just don't get it: why didn't the Lord Captain make Master Killjoy the new Marshal? He's the most hard-headed, immovable boulder of a lawman in the sector — what other qualities are there to look for?"

traits.locale_text: 「なんか納得いかないわ。なぜロード・キャプテンは堅物マスターを新しい将帥に任命しなかったの？彼ほど頭が固くて揺るがない、まさに岩のような法執行官なんて、この星域には他にいないのに。他に一体どんな資質が必要だっていうの？」

languages.text: "Ich verstehe es einfach nicht: Warum hat der Lord Captain Meister Spielverderber nicht zum neuen Marschall gemacht? Er ist der störrischste, unbeweglichste Fels von einem Gesetzeshüter im ganzen Sektor. Welche anderen Eigenschaften werden denn gesucht?"
languages.original_text: "I just don't get it: why didn't the Lord Captain make Master Killjoy the new Marshal? He's the most hard-headed, immovable boulder of a lawman in the sector — what other qualities are there to look for?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe es einfach nicht: Warum hat der Lord Captain Meister Spielverderber nicht zum neuen Marschall gemacht? Er ist der störrischste, unbeweglichste Fels von einem Gesetzeshüter im ganzen Sektor. Welche anderen Eigenschaften werden denn gesucht?"

languages.text: « J'ai du mal à comprendre pourquoi {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} n'a pas donné le poste de maréchal à maître Rabat-joie. On ne fait pas plus buté que lui, ce type a la tête plus dure que la pierre. Ce n'est pas la qualité la plus importante pour un représentant de l'ordre ? »
languages.original_text: "I just don't get it: why didn't the Lord Captain make Master Killjoy the new Marshal? He's the most hard-headed, immovable boulder of a lawman in the sector — what other qualities are there to look for?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai du mal à comprendre pourquoi {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} n'a pas donné le poste de maréchal à maître Rabat-joie. On ne fait pas plus buté que lui, ce type a la tête plus dure que la pierre. Ce n'est pas la qualité la plus importante pour un représentant de l'ordre ? »

languages.text: «Yo es que no lo entiendo: ¿por qué no ha nombrado {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán a maese aguafiestas como nuevo mariscal? Es el agente de la ley más obstinado e inamovible de todo el sector; ¿qué más cualidades hay que tener para el cargo?».
languages.original_text: "I just don't get it: why didn't the Lord Captain make Master Killjoy the new Marshal? He's the most hard-headed, immovable boulder of a lawman in the sector — what other qualities are there to look for?"

traits.locale_text: «Yo es que no lo entiendo: ¿por qué no ha nombrado {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán a maese aguafiestas como nuevo mariscal? Es el agente de la ley más obstinado e inamovible de todo el sector; ¿qué más cualidades hay que tener para el cargo?».

languages.text: “我真是想不明白，舰长大人怎么就不让那个泼冷水大师当新的元帅呢？他是整个星区里脑子最轴、脾气最倔、最像头犟驴的法务官，元帅不就是得让这种人当吗？”
languages.original_text: "I just don't get it: why didn't the Lord Captain make Master Killjoy the new Marshal? He's the most hard-headed, immovable boulder of a lawman in the sector — what other qualities are there to look for?"

traits.locale_text: “我真是想不明白，舰长大人怎么就不让那个泼冷水大师当新的元帅呢？他是整个星区里脑子最轴、脾气最倔、最像头犟驴的法务官，元帅不就是得让这种人当吗？”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Oyunbozan Efendi'yi nasıl Miralay yapmadı ki? Cidden aklım almıyor. Sektördeki en sarsılmaz, en inatçı kanun adamı o... Daha ne olsun?"
languages.original_text: "I just don't get it: why didn't the Lord Captain make Master Killjoy the new Marshal? He's the most hard-headed, immovable boulder of a lawman in the sector — what other qualities are there to look for?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Oyunbozan Efendi'yi nasıl Miralay yapmaz, aklım almıyor. Sektördeki en sarsılmaz, en inatçı kanun adamı o, daha ne olsun yahu?"

languages.original_text: "I just don't get it: why didn't the Lord Captain make Master Killjoy the new Marshal? He's the most hard-headed, immovable boulder of a lawman in the sector — what other qualities are there to look for?"
